lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Aug. 31 (AP) -- The Japanese people, who were told after the Battle of the Coral Sea that the United States Pacific Fleet had been annihilated, now were being warned to be prepared for new attacks by a "superior force" from America, the Office of War Information reported today.
abstract: OWI repts Capt H Hiraide radio s warning Jap pub of renewed US attacks
